koohiiStory1: Here comes a new challenge, try to kill Bowser, the giant Turtle using jut on finger.
koohiiStory2: You are sure to take a challenge because your victory was portended. So you stand self-confident before your foe, point a finger at him and say "I will prevail, as was long portended!".
myStory: thách thức. thách thức tay mang đồ
words: to challenge, to contend for, to make love to
